rdf:Description.dc:title: Beekeeping in western Canada 1998

rdf:Description.dc:publisher: Edmonton, Alta. : Alberta Agriculture, Food and Rural Development, Publishing Branch,
rdf:Description.dc:description: "This publication is a revision of the former Prairie Beekeeping Manual prepared by D.C. Murrell and D.N. MacDonald."
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Bee culture
